title: Costco tariff refunds case grows — will the Supreme Court overturn Trump’s import duties and trigger billions in corporate paybacks this month?
description: Costco tariff refunds are now in play — and billions hang on the Supreme Court’s next move. Costco has already paid an estimated $90B in import tariffs tied to President Trump’s baseline 10% to 50% duty increases, part of a record $195B collected in fiscal 20…
content: Costco could soon receive tariff refunds and the case now sits at the center of one of the most important trade battles in decades. The retailer has sued the US government seeking repayment of billio… [+7822 chars]
